titles.title: Victim-Activated Landmine Abolition Act of 2006
To prohibit the procurement of victim-activated landmines and other weapons that are designed to be victim-activated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 9/26/2006--Introduced. Victim-Activated Landmine Abolition Act of 2006 - Expresses the sense of Congress that the government should continue to set an example for other countries by banning procurement of victim-activated landmines and other weapons designed to be victim-activated. Prohibits the federal government from procuring such landmines or weapons in any circumstance.
